overview: A beautiful con artist marries Hayes Hallan, the owner of a pearl-rich island. No sooner has the couple said "I do" than Beatrice's partners in crime show up, claiming to be the bride's parents.
tagline: THE TRUSTED PAL of Crooks, she Aimed to Aid them in Stealing a Fortune in Pearls, but-Cupid took a hand in the game, then- Intrigue, Tragedy and Love.
title: The Wedding Song
